scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && uv venv --python 3.12 && source .venv/bin/activate && uv pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npx wait-on tcp:8000 && npm run frontend" --kill-others --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently "npm run backend:win" "npx wait-on tcp:8000 && npm run frontend" --kill-others --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan"
